afterCommit.message: add SameSite attribute for SSO cookie

commit.message: add SameSite attribute for SSO cookie

afterCommit.message: add SameSite attribute for SSO cookie

nodes.bodyText:
change
Specifies the SameSite attribute value to use for SSO cookie.
to
Specifies the SameSite attribute value to use for SSO cookies.
or
Specifies the SameSite attribute value to use for the SSO cookie.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -101,3 +101,11 @@ contextRootForFormAuthenticationMechanism.desc=Specifies the context root of a f
 
 basicAuthenticationMechanismRealmName=Realm name of the Java EE 8 basic authentication
 basicAuthenticationMechanismRealmName.desc=Specifies a realm name for the Java EE 8 Security HTTP basic authentication. This value is applicable when overrideHttpAuthMethod is set to BASIC, or if overrideHttpAuthMethod is set to CLIENT_CERT and allowAuthenticationFailOverToAuthMethod is set to BASIC. The default value is defaultRealm.
+
+# The word SameSite should not be translated
+sameSiteCookie=Add the SameSite attribute to the SSO cookie
+sameSiteCookie.desc=Specifies the SameSite attribute value to use for SSO cookie.

nodes.bodyText:
add period
Add the SameSite attribute to the SSO cookie.
